# selectionHighlightStyle

**Instance Property**

Specifies the selection highlight style.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var selectionHighlightStyle: NSTableView.SelectionHighlightStyle { get set }
```

## Discussion

The possible values are specified in [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTableView/SelectionHighlightStyle-swift.enum] in [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTableView].

## Row Selection

- **isSelected**: Determines whether the row is selected.
